abstract: Former Canadian Justice Marie Deschamps will lead independent panel investigating how United Nations handled inquiry into accusations that French peacekeepers sexually abused children in Central African Republic.
lead_paragraph: An independent panel will examine how the United Nations handled an inquiry into accusations that French peacekeepers sexually abused children in the Central African Republic.

headline.main: Panel Is Named to Investigate Handling of Allegations Against French Troops
headline.print_headline: United Nations; Panel Is Named to Investigate Handling of Allegations Against French Troops

snippet: An independent panel will examine how the United Nations handled an inquiry into accusations that French peacekeepers sexually abused children in the Central African Republic.
